title.en: Otto wa Watashi ni Mainichi Maiban Oboretai

altTitles.en: My Husband Dotes on Me Day and Night

altTitles.zh: 老公想每日每夜被我沉溺

altTitles.ja: 夫は私に毎日毎晩溺れたい

description.en:
"It's a sloppy mess here, may I lick it?" he said to his wife, Yuki-chan.

An ideal husband: High income and good looking. But at night he is a pervert who likes to have XXX so much…?! Regardless of where he is, Yoshi-kun clings to his wife's legs every day and night. There weren't any hints before marriage but she didn't expect it to turn out like this!! Being driven crazy by him is shameful yet pleasurable for her?!

[High speed Husband] vs Marriage Hunting Girls

A gentle and handsome husband has a crazy tendency only for his wife!?
